# barStyle

**Instance Property**

The tab bar style that specifies its appearance.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var barStyle: UIBarStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property determines whether the tab bar uses a dark or light visual style when no background image or tint color is specified. Together with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/isTranslucent] property, this property defines the default visual style of the tab bar. Set this property to the value that best matches the style of your interface. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarStyle]. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarStyle/default].

## Setting the bar’s style

- **UIBarStyle**: Defines the stylistic appearance of different types of views.
